meanings: [명사] judgment, decision, [동사] judge, decide, make a judgment, make a decision

vlive.korean: 그 친구가 나를 좋아하는지 안 좋아하는지 판단이 잘 안 서잖아요? you can't judge whether that person likes you or not? 듣기 View video ITZY : 류진이의 왓어원더풀나잇💙
vlive.english: you can't judge whether that person likes you or not?

vlive.korean: 그러니까 무조건 도망치라는 것도 아닌데 상황 판단을 잘 해서... I don't mean to run away. You should calculate the risks. 듣기 View video NCT : 천지의 고민상담소
vlive.english: I don't mean to run away. You should calculate the risks.

vlive.korean: 빠른 판단이죠? Fast judgement, right? 듣기 View video KIM JAEHWAN(김재환) : [김재환] 화요일 저녁은 재환이랑 치킨먹어요🍗
저는 제 외모를 판단... I don't decide my... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 45
[판단은 아로하에게...] [Let's leave it up to AROHA to decide...] View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] with 곰곰이🐻

examples.korean: ‘Freedom fighter’ is a value-laden word. 듣기 Add to Wordbook ‘자유의 투사’는 가치 판단적인 단어이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The reforms were generally adjudged to have failed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 개혁들은 대체로 실패했다는 판단이 내려졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The reforms were generally adjudged to have failed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She now realizes that she misjudged him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 이제 자기가 그를 잘못 판단했다는 것을 깨닫고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She now realizes that she misjudged him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There was no mistaking the bitterness in her voice. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 목소리에 담긴 신랄함을 잘못 판단할 수는 없었다[신랄함은 누가 봐도 분명했다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
